scripts.browser: browserify src/lib/index.js -o src/js/markdown-template.js && browserify src/test/index.js -o src/test/test.js && npm run lint
scripts.test: npm run spec && npm run lint
scripts.lint: jshint src/lib/anchor.js src/lib/build.js src/lib/collapse.js src/lib/compile.js src/lib/figure.js src/lib/hanging.js src/lib/punctuation.js src/lib/abbrev.js src/lib/templates.js src/lib/section.js src/lib/social.js src/lib/toc.js src/lib/util.js src/lib/index.js src/test/index.js && standard src/lib/anchor.js src/lib/build.js src/lib/collapse.js src/lib/compile.js src/lib/figure.js src/lib/hanging.js src/lib/punctuation.js src/lib/section.js src/lib/social.js src/lib/abbrev.js src/lib/templates.js src/lib/toc.js src/lib/util.js src/lib/index.js src/test/index.js && markdownlint src/index.txt
scripts.commit: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a -m "Updated `git status | sed -n '/modified:/ {s/^[[:space:]]*modified:[[:space:]]*//;s/\.txt$//;s/\.md$//;s/\.html$//;s/\/index$//;p;q;}'`"
scripts.amend: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a --amend --no-edit
scripts.reword: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a --amend
scripts.push: git --no-pager status && git pull && git push
